title: KD and Nets agree to run it back
description:
The Nets and Kevin Durant got together and have agreed to move forward with their partnership next season. The goal: bringing a championship to Brooklyn. Find out how likely that is to happen and if this team is a betting favorite for next season. Also, the guys breakdown what this means for Kyrie Irving has he enters his final season with Brooklyn. Plus, the latest Knicks trade offer for Donovan Mitchell. Is it enough or too much? Find out why Jalen thinks it’s not a good idea to trade these assets for one player. And, the hot dog straw? What are we doing in The Bronx? Listen as the guys break down their issues with the hot dog beer straw.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
